message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SD, cs.SD, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

This paper is about speaker adaptation in end-to-end automatic speech recognition systems, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP) and speech processing. Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves machine learning techniques such as regularization and multi-task learning, which are commonly used in various sub-fields of computer science. Therefore, cs.SD (Sound) and cs.LG (Machine Learning) are also likely sub-categories. Additionally, the paper focuses on improving the performance of the main task, which is a common goal in artificial intelligence research, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a possible sub-category.
